text: :For the city in the Sabirabad Rayon previously called Petropavlovka, see Sabirabad (city). Dəlləkli (known as Petropavlovka until 1992) is a village and municipality in the Quba Rayon of Azerbaijan. It has a population of 826. ==References== Category:Populated places in Quba District (Azerbaijan)
title: Dəlləkli, Quba
